settings.heading: Full Stack Developer
settings.detail:
Job Description:

Sun Genomics is working to change the way we view our microbiome in health and wellness. We are seeking a passionate supply chain/logistics technician to join us and help to solve a challenging set of problems in establishing a logistics strategy for our startup company. We are seeking a logistics technician who is capable of working with a team and executing independently to develop and apply logistic workflows. The qualified candidate will be fully competent and proficient to develop and handle an inventory management system, tracking lots, implementing a quality control system, shipping goods, and customer tracking. We are looking for someone seeking a challenging project, who is ambitious, detail oriented, and able to independently perform tasks with accuracy.

Responsibilities:

  • Build and own our frontend architecture
  • Push the boundaries of modern frontend engineering to build fast and ambitious web applications
  • Work closely with our Product Team and Engineering teams to build features that have significant business impact
  • Design elegant and intuitive UI components
  • Drive forward thinking for frontend technologies at Sun Genomics
  • Implement the functionality necessary to power the front end to life in our backend services
  • Work in small but tight teams
  • Understand our business context deeply and leverage your engineering knowledge to propose creative solutions to problems

Requirements:

  • A degree from an accredited university in Computer Science or related field.
  • Deep understanding of JavaScript and its fundamentals. Experience with Ember.js a plus.
  • Understand the complexities of the DOM and CSS, especially how they interact.
  • Interpret UI performance metrics and address issues accordingly
  • Know and understand the implications of the latest developments in ECMAScript
  • Learn from and mentor other engineers
  • Reason about trade-offs when discussing frontend technologies
  • Navigate and write backend code
  • Besides Javascript, also proficient in Java, Ruby, Python or a similar language powering backend services
  • Are Interested in working in a team applying data science to solve challenging business problems
  • See yourself as an entrepreneur as well as an engineer
  • Have at least 5 years of professional experience, and have served as tech lead for a specific application, product area, or level of infrastructure
  • Can balance deep work with cross team collaboration

Who you would work with:

  • You would join a dynamic and diverse team who enjoy solving interesting problems in a collaborative environment
  • You will work in a startup environment with unique people who come from many different backgrounds.
  • Your co-workers will include motivated recent graduates as well as experienced industry leaders
